def main():
    n, x = list(map(int, input().split()))
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    s = sum(a)
    print('YES' if s + (n - 1) == x else 'NO')

main()

# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-

def f(n, x, arr):

  if x == (sum(arr) + n - 1):
    print('YES')
  else:
    print('NO')

  n, x = list(map(int, input().split()))
  arr = list(map(int, input().split()))

  # for i in range(n):
  #   list(map(int, input().split()))

  f(n, x, arr)
